question: Can we distribute the meat of Eid-ul-Adha to the non-believers?
answer:
QUESTION
Can we distribute the meat of the sacrificed animal of Eid-ul-Adha to the non-believers?
ANSWER


Share:

In the Name of Allāh, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

As-salāmu ‘alaykum wa-rahmatullāhi wa-barakātuh.


Yes, you may distribute the meat of the sacrifice of Eid-ul-Adha to non-Muslims, as long as its not given as compensation for services provided by them.[i] [ii] [iii]


And Allāh knows best.

Ml. Sohail Bengali
Chicago, IL (USA)

Concurred by:

Muftī Abrar Mirza
Chicago, IL (USA)

Under the Supervision of Muftī Ebrahim Desai (South Africa)

 

ويهب منها ما شاء للغني والفقير والمسلم والذمي ، كذا في الغياثية[i]

الفتاوى الهندية، كتاب الأضحية، باب بيان محل إقامة الواجب: ٥/ ٣٧١، دار الكتب العلمية

 فتاوى محمودية كتاب الأضحية، ٤/ ٣٠٩ كتب خانة مظهري [ii]

 آب كي مسائل أور أن كا حل، ٤/ ٢٠٩، مكتبة لدهيانوي[iii]
